name: Computer Spammer
short_description:
This is a computer message box spammer disguised as "Literature Portal.7z". It should be flagged as suspicious but with a properly designed webpage, it should convince end-users to download this and get spammed. 

This is a standalone .7z version of my other project which is launched from a thumbdrive and can steal passwords and then lag the com up. However this only includes the com lagger.

Future improvements could include increase in speed (or lag), not to mention a legit-looking license file once I actually bother to type out all that crap.

please don't download it from the main screen, instead, browse to files and see which version would you want.
summary: An zip file which after/during unzip spams the user with messages
